headline: Everest Group Announces Dividend
summary: HAMILTON, Bermuda, February 26, 2026--Everest Group, Ltd. announced that its Board of Directors declared a dividend of $2.00 per common share. This dividend will be payable on or before March 27, 2026 to all shareholders of record as of March 13, 2026.
